comment.author: 92018993@N03
comment._content: This is my grandparents house right before they bought it. This is the 170 range of Walnut St. In New Bedford MA. Was not expecting to find a picture of it on the internet. Thank you for publishing this.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: You're welcome, Steph. Thank you for sharing the street name and vicinity. Please feel free to add any other details you remember about the neighborhood.

comment._content: This reminds me of Walker Evans with the industrial stacks directly behind the homes. Cool photo.
